snippet: Jurors have awarded the former director of Georgia’s ethics commission $700,000 after ruling in her favor in a lawsuit in which she said her salary had been cut and a deputy removed for investigating complaints against Gov. Nathan Deal.
lead_paragraph: Jurors have awarded the former director of Georgia’s ethics commission $700,000 after ruling in her favor in a lawsuit in which she said her salary had been cut and a deputy removed for investigating complaints against Gov. Nathan Deal.

headline.main: Ethics Chief in Georgia Wins Suit Over Ouster
headline.print_headline: Ethics Chief In Georgia Wins Suit Over Ouster
